item.title: azure: [Launched] Open Source: Announcing the DocumentDB Kubernetes Operator
item.description:
Microsoft announced the open-source DocumentDB Kubernetes Operator, which lets you run DocumentDB (a MongoDBâ€‘compatible, open-source document database built on PostgreSQL) on Kubernetes by extending the cluster with custom resource definitions (CRDs).

  • Source: Azure Updates
